<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82218</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82218</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4727</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">EU Online Research</string>
            <string language="es">Investigación en línea de la UE</string>
            <string language="ga">Taighe AE ar líne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EU Onlineforschung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche En ligne d'EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa Em linha do EU</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca In linea Di UE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση έρευνα της ΕΕ</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan plus worksheet which shows pupils how the Internet can be used to source information about, for example, the EU. Could be used for the completion of class projects.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección más hoja de trabajo que muestra a los alumnos cómo se puede utilizar Internet para obtener información, como por ejemplo, la UE. Podría ser utilizado para completar proyectos de clase.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta agus bileog oibre a léiríonn do dhaltaí gur féidir an t-idirlíon a úsáid chun eolas a aimsiú ar, mar shampla, an AE. D’fhéadfaí é a úsáid chun tionscadail ranga a chríochnú.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Geography</string>
            <string language="es">Geografía SESE</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Tíreolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Human Environments</string>
            <string language="es">Entornos humanos. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Timpeallachtaí Daonna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan plus Bogen, der Pupillen zeigt, wie 
das Internet zu den Quellinformationen ungefähr benutzt werden kann 
z.B. das EU. Konnte für die Beendigung der Kategorie Projekte 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon plus le tableau qui montre à des 
pupilles comment l'Internet peut être utilisé à l'information de 
source environ, par exemple, l'EU. A pu être utilisé pour 
l'accomplissement des projets de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição mais a folha que mostra às 
pupilas como o Internet pode ser usado à informação da fonte sobre,
para o exemplo, o EU. Podia ser usado para a conclusão de 
projetos da classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione più il foglio di lavoro che 
mostra a pupille come il Internet può essere usato alle informazioni 
di sorgente circa, per esempio, l'UE. Ha potuto essere 
usato per il completamento dei progetti del codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος συν το φύλλο εργασίας που εμφανίζει 
στους μαθητές πώς το Διαδίκτυο μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί στις 
πληροφορίες πηγής για, παραδείγματος χάριν, την ΕΕ. Θα 
μπορούσε να χρησιμοποιηθεί για την ολοκλήρωση των προγραμμάτων 
κλάσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschliche Umgebungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Géographie de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Environnements Humains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Geografia de SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ambientes Humanos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Geografia di SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ambienti Umani</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωγραφία SESE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρώπινα περιβάλλοντα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
